html>\\n<html lang=\\\"en\\\">\\n<head>\\n   <meta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\" \\\/>\\n   <title>Desktops and Tablets<\\\/title>\\n \\n   <script type=\\\"text\\\/javascript\\\" src=\\\"https:\\\/\\\/ajax.googleapis.com\\\/ajax\\\/libs\\\/jquery\\\/1.7.1\\\/jquery.min.js\\\"><\\\/script>\\n \\n   <script type=\\\"text\\\/javascript\\\">\\n      $(document).ready(function () {\\n         initialize();\\n      });\\n \\n\\n      \\\/\\\/ works out the X, Y position of the click inside the canvas from the X, Y position on the page\\n      function getPosition(mouseEvent, sigCanvas) {\\n         var x, y;\\n         if (mouseEvent.pageX != undefined && mouseEvent.pageY != undefined) {\\n            x = mouseEvent.pageX;\\n            y = mouseEvent.pageY;\\n         } else {\\n            x = mouseEvent.clientX + document.body.scrollLeft + document.documentElement.scrollLeft;\\n            y = mouseEvent.clientY + document.body.scrollTop + document.documentElement.scrollTop;\\n         }\\n \\n         return { X: x - sigCanvas.offsetLeft, Y: y - sigCanvas.offsetTop };\\n      }\\n \\n      function initialize() {\\n         \\\/\\\/ get references to the canvas element as well as the 2D drawing context\\n         var sigCanvas = document.getElementById(\\\"canvasSignature\\\");\\n         var context = sigCanvas.getContext(\\\"2d\\\");\\n         context.strokeStyle = 'Black';\\n \\n         \\\/\\\/ This will be defined on a TOUCH device such as iPad or Android, etc.\\n         var is_touch_device = 'ontouchstart' in document.documentElement;\\n \\n         if (is_touch_device) {\\n            \\\/\\\/ create a drawer which tracks touch movements\\n            var drawer = {\\n               isDrawing: false,\\n               touchstart: function (coors) {\\n                  context.beginPath();\\n                  context.moveTo(coors.x, coors.y);\\n                  this.isDrawing = true;\\n               },\\n               touchmove: function (coors) {\\n                  if (this.isDrawing) {\\n                     context.lineTo(coors.x, coors.y);\\n                     context.stroke();\\n                  }\\n               },\\n               touchend: function (coors) {\\n                  if (this.isDrawing) {\\n                     this.touchmove(coors);\\n                     this.isDrawing = false;\\n                  }\\n               }\\n            };\\n \\n            \\\/\\\/ create a function to pass touch events and coordinates to drawer\\n            function draw(event) {\\n \\n               \\\/\\\/ get the touch coordinates.  Using the first touch in case of multi-touch\\n               var coors = {\\n                  x: event.targetTouches[0].pageX,\\n                  y: event.targetTouches[0].pageY\\n               };\\n \\n               \\\/\\\/ Now we need to get the offset of the canvas location\\n               var obj = sigCanvas;\\n \\n               if (obj.offsetParent) {\\n                  \\\/\\\/ Every time we find a new object, we add its offsetLeft and offsetTop to curleft and curtop.\\n                  do {\\n                     coors.x -= obj.offsetLeft;\\n                     coors.y -= obj.offsetTop;\\n                  }\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t  \\\/\\\/ The while loop can be \\\"while (obj = obj.offsetParent)\\\" only, which does return null\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t  \\\/\\\/ when null is passed back, but that creates a warning in some editors (i.e. VS2010).\\n                  while ((obj = obj.offsetParent) != null);\\n               }\\n \\n               \\\/\\\/ pass the coordinates to the appropriate handler\\n               drawer[event.type](coors);\\n            }\\n \\n\\n            \\\/\\\/ attach the touchstart, touchmove, touchend event listeners.\\n            sigCanvas.addEventListener('touchstart', draw, false);\\n            sigCanvas.addEventListener('touchmove', draw, false);\\n            sigCanvas.addEventListener('touchend', draw, false);\\n \\n            \\\/\\\/ prevent elastic scrolling\\n            sigCanvas.addEventListener('touchmove', function (event) {\\n               event.preventDefault();\\n            }, false); \\n         }\\n         else {\\n \\n            \\\/\\\/ start drawing when the mousedown event fires, and attach handlers to\\n            \\\/\\\/ draw a line to wherever the mouse moves to\\n            $(\\\"#canvasSignature\\\").mousedown(function (mouseEvent) {\\n               var position = getPosition(mouseEvent, sigCanvas);\\n \\n               context.moveTo(position.X, position.Y);\\n               context.beginPath();\\n \\n               \\\/\\\/ attach event handlers\\n               $(this).mousemove(function (mouseEvent) {\\n                  drawLine(mouseEvent, sigCanvas, context);\\n               }).mouseup(function (mouseEvent) {\\n                  finishDrawing(mouseEvent, sigCanvas, context);\\n               }).mouseout(function (mouseEvent) {\\n                  finishDrawing(mouseEvent, sigCanvas, context);\\n               });\\n            });\\n \\n         }\\n      }\\n \\n      \\\/\\\/ draws a line to the x and y coordinates of the mouse event inside\\n      \\\/\\\/ the specified element using the specified context\\n      function drawLine(mouseEvent, sigCanvas, context) {\\n \\n         var position = getPosition(mouseEvent, sigCanvas);\\n \\n         context.lineTo(position.X, position.Y);\\n         context.stroke();\\n      }\\n \\n      \\\/\\\/ draws a line from the last coordiantes in the path to the finishing\\n      \\\/\\\/ coordinates and unbind any event handlers which need to be preceded\\n      \\\/\\\/ by the mouse down event\\n      function finishDrawing(mouseEvent, sigCanvas, context) {\\n         \\\/\\\/ draw the line to the finishing coordinates\\n         drawLine(mouseEvent, sigCanvas, context);\\n \\n         context.closePath();\\n \\n         \\\/\\\/ unbind any events which could draw\\n         $(sigCanvas).unbind(\\\"mousemove\\\")\\n                     .unbind(\\\"mouseup\\\")\\n                     .unbind(\\\"mouseout\\\");\\n      }\\n   <\\\/script>\\n   \\n<\\\/head>\\n \\n<body>\\n   <h1>Canvas test<\\\/h1>\\n \\n   <div id=\\\"canvasDiv\\\">\\n      <!-- It's bad practice (to me) to put your CSS here.  I'd recommend the use of a CSS file! -->\\n      <canvas id=\\\"canvasSignature\\\" width=\\\"500px\\\" height=\\\"500px\\\" style=\\\"border:2px solid #000000;\\\"><\\\/canvas>\\n   <\\\/div>\\n<\\\/body>\\n<\\\/html>\"}},\"pauseWithoutShowingParameters\":false}]}","font_bold":false,"name":"button1","uuid":"692FB1B4-9588-4F80-B4D7-3AEB3A2B48DE"},"frame":"{{74, 188}, {131,    <script src=\\\"http:\\\/\\\/d3lp1msu2r81bx.cloudfront.net\\\/kjs\\\/js\\\/lib\\\/kinetic-v4.7.4.min.js\\\"><\\\/script>\\n    <script src=\\\"\\\/\\\/cdnjs.cloudflare.com\\\/ajax\\\/libs\\\/moment.js\\\/2.2.1\\\/moment.min.js\\\"><\\\/script>\\n    <script src=\\\"http:\\\/\\\/d3lp1msu2r81bx.cloudfront.net\\\/mc\\\/js\\\/lib\\\/meteorcharts-v0.0.11.min.js\\\"><\\\/script>\\n    <script defer=\\\"defer\\\"> \\n      function Grapher(config) {\\n        var minX = config.minX,\\n            minY = config.minY,\\n            maxX = config.maxX,\\n            maxY = config.maxY,\\n            increment = config.increment,\\n            equations = config.equations,\\n            len = equations.length,\\n            series = [],\\n            n, x, equation, currentSeries, func, y;\\n  \\n        for (n=0; n<len; n++) {\\n          equation = equations[n];\\n          func = equation.func;\\n          currentSeries = {\\n            title: equation.title,\\n            points: []\\n          };\\n  \\n          for (x=minX; x<=maxX; x+=increment) {\\n            y = Math.round(func(x) * 100) \\\/ 100;\\n            if (y>=minY && y<=maxY) {\\n              currentSeries.points.push({\\n                x: Math.round(x * 100) \\\/ 100,\\n                y: y\\n              });\\n            }\\n          }\\n  \\n          series.push(currentSeries);\\n        }\\n  \\n        return series;\\n      }\\n  \\n      var series = Grapher({\\n        minX: -10,\\n        minY: -10,\\n        maxX: 10,\\n        maxY: 10,\\n        increment: 0.1,\\n        equations: [\\n          {\\n            title: 'y=5*sin(x)',\\n            func: function(x) {\\n              return 5 * Math.sin(x);\\n            }\\n          },\\n  \\n          {\\n            title: 'y=x^2',\\n            func: function(x) {\\n              return x * x;\\n            }\\n          },\\n     \\n          {\\n            title: 'y=x',\\n            func: function(x) {\\n              return 1 * x;\\n            }\\n          }\\n        ]\\n      });\\n  \\n      var lineChart = new MeteorCharts.Line({\\n        container: 'container',\\n        view: {\\n          width: 580,\\n          height: 300,\\n          xAxis: {\\n            formatter: 'Number',\\n            min: -10,\\n            max: 10\\n          },\\n          yAxis: {\\n            min: -10,\\n            max: 10\\n          }\\n        },\\n        model: {\\n          title: 'Grapher',\\n          series: series\\n        }\\n      });\\n    <\\\/script>\\n  <\\\/body>\\n<\\\/html>
